text:
The HTML files generated by Anakia contain the sequence

for all input
tags. This should not matter, but browsers seem to treat
the same as
, thus generating extra lines in the output. Simplest solution is to strip out the
tags - they have been known to cause problems for Java HTML display as well.
creator: sebb@apache.org
